documents.document: Loved the hotel I have stayed in this hotel in 2006, and that was one of the best hotels I stayed friendly staff and what I just forget is the fruit that they had at the know if they still give free fruits but we all just liked the idea. I had a single room that was really big with a great bathroom.We were there for a business stay and we also had meetings in the hotel conference equipment and again friendly staff.Great choice for a break in
